events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has several scratches and a small crack on the surface. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue involves visible damage and a defect on the received product, categorizing this case under Product Defect.
An agent has been assigned to handle this product defect claim and will follow up shortly.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I'm here to help resolve this issue promptly.
Could you please send us pictures of the scratches and the crack? This will help us process your claim faster.
I have attached several photos showing the scratches on the side and the crack near the handle, as you requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can arrange a free replacement to be shipped immediately or offer a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement sent as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick response and helpful solution.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within the next 24 hours with expedited delivery.
We wanted to check in and make sure your replacement product was received in perfect condition and meets your expectations.
Since your replacement was delivered and you have not reported further issues, we are closing the case. Thank you for your cooperation.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
